speaker: THALIARD
text:
So
               
              this
               
              is
               
              Tyre
              ,
               
              and
               
              this
               
              the
               
              court
              .
               
              Here
              
              must
               
              I
               
              kill
               
              King
               
              Pericles
              ;
               
              and
               
              if
               
              I
               
              do
               
              it
               
              not
              ,
               
              I
               
              am
              
              sure
               
              to
               
              be
               
              hanged
               
              at
               
              home
              .
               
              ’Tis
               
              dangerous
              .
               
              Well
              ,
               
              I
              
              perceive
               
              he
               
              was
               
              a
               
              wise
               
              fellow
               
              and
               
              had
               
              good
               
              discretion
              
              that
              ,
               
              being
               
              bid
               
              to
               
              ask
               
              what
               
              he
               
              would
               
              of
               
              the
              
              king
              ,
               
              desired
               
              he
               
              might
               
              know
               
              none
               
              of
               
              his
               
              secrets
              .
              
              Now
               
              do
               
              I
               
              see
               
              he
               
              had
               
              some
               
              reason
               
              for
               
              ’t
              ,
               
              for
               
              if
               
              a
              
              king
               
              bid
               
              a
               
              man
               
              be
               
              a
               
              villain
              ,
               
              he’s
               
              bound
               
              by
               
              the
              
              indenture
               
              of
               
              his
               
              oath
               
              to
               
              be
               
              one
              .
               
              Husht
              !
               
              Here
              
              comes
               
              the
               
              lords
               
              of
               
              Tyre
              .

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
You
               
              shall
               
              not
               
              need
              ,
               
              my
               
              fellow
               
              peers
               
              of
               
              Tyre
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Further
               
              to
               
              question
               
              me
               
              of
               
              your
               
              king’s
               
              departure
              .

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
His
               
              sealed
               
              commission
               
              left
               
              in
               
              trust
               
              with
               
              me

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Does
               
              speak
               
              sufficiently
               
              he’s
               
              gone
               
              to
               
              travel
              .

speaker: THALIARD
text:
How
              ?
               
              The
               
              King
               
              gone
              ?

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
If
               
              further
               
              yet
               
              you
               
              will
               
              be
               
              satisfied

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Why
              ,
               
              as
               
              it
               
              were
              ,
               
              unlicensed
               
              of
               
              your
               
              loves

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
He
               
              would
               
              depart
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              give
               
              some
               
              light
               
              unto
               
              you
              .

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Being
               
              at
               
              Antioch
              —

speaker: THALIARD
text:
What
               
              from
               
              Antioch
              ?

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Royal
               
              Antiochus
              ,
               
              on
               
              what
               
              cause
               
              I
               
              know
               
              not
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Took
               
              some
               
              displeasure
               
              at
               
              him
              —
              at
               
              least
               
              he
               
              judged
               
              so
              ;

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
And
               
              doubting
               
              lest
               
              he
               
              had
               
              erred
               
              or
               
              sinned
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
To
               
              show
               
              his
               
              sorrow
              ,
               
              he’d
               
              correct
               
              himself
              ;

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
So
               
              puts
               
              himself
               
              unto
               
              the
               
              shipman’s
               
              toil
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
With
               
              whom
               
              each

              threatens
               
              life
               
              or

speaker: THALIARD
text:
Well
              ,
               
              I
               
              perceive
               
              I
               
              shall
               
              not
               
              be

              now
              ,
               
              although
               
              I
               
              would
              ;
               
              but
               
              since

              ,
               
              the
              
              King’s
               
              ears
               
              it
               
              must
               
              please
              .
               
              He
               
              ’scaped
               
              the
               
              land
               
              to
              
              perish
               
              at
               
              the
               
              sea
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              present
               
              myself
              .
              —
              Peace
               
              to
               
              the
              
              lords
               
              of
               
              Tyre
              !

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Lord
               
              Thaliard
               
              from
               
              Antiochus
               
              is
               
              welcome
              .

speaker: THALIARD
text:
From
               
              him
               
              I
               
              come
               
              with
               
              message
               
              unto
               
              princely
              
              Pericles
              ,
               
              but
               
              since
               
              my
               
              landing
               
              I
               
              have

              your
               
              lord
               
              has

              to

              Now
               
              message
               
              must
               
              return
               
              from

              it
               
              came
              .

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
We
               
              have
               
              no

              to
               
              desire
               
              it
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS

Commended

As
